name.baseName: cement production;cement, portland-composite cement;new dry process rotary kiln, 4000t/d;mixed solid wastes
水泥生产;水泥, 复合硅酸盐水泥;新型干法回转窑, 4000 t/d;混合固废

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The new dry rotary kiln produces cement by mixing solid waste materials referred to as fly ash and blast furnace slag.
新型干法回转窑生产水泥。混合固废指粉煤灰和矿渣。

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: The data collection time is 2009 and 2010.
数据采集时间为2009年和2010年。

technology.technologicalApplicability: This industrial process is utilized for the production of cement, specifically ordinary Portland cement grade 42.4 and composite Portland cement grade 32.5. The new dry process rotary kiln technology is employed to create cement clinker at a rate of 4000 tons per day. This process incorporates mixed solid wastes like fly ash and blast furnace slag as part of the raw materials, emphasizing resource recovery and sustainability in the cement industry. This technology and cement product are applicable in construction projects requiring high-strength concrete and in areas where fly ash and slag are available as byproducts to be utilized in cement manufacturing.
该工业过程用于生产水泥，具体为普通硅酸盐42.4级水泥和复合硅酸盐32.5级水泥。新型干法回转窑技术被采用，每天能够生产4000吨水泥熟料。该过程结合了混合固废，如粉煤灰和高炉渣作为原材料的一部分，强调在水泥工业中资源回收和可持续性。这项技术和水泥产品适用于需要高强度混凝土的建筑项目以及那些可作为水泥制造副产品利用粉煤灰与渣的地区。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: The functional unit of cement life cycle assessment is 1 ton of cement product.The entire cement life cycle is divided into raw material preparation unit, pulverized coal preparation unit, clinker calcination unit and cement grinding unit. The raw material preparation stage (raw meal preparation) includes raw material crushing, grinding, drying and pre-homogenization processes; the pulverized coal preparation stage includes raw coal transportation, storage and grinding; the clinker calcination stage includes preheating decomposition and adding coal to the rotary kiln. During the heating process of powder and raw materials, CO2, SO2, NOx and other waste gases are emitted; the cement grinding stage includes gypsum, limestone crushing and cement grinding.
水泥生命周期评价的功能单位为1吨水泥产品。整个水泥生命周期划分为原料准备单元、煤粉制备单元、熟料煅烧单元和水泥粉磨单元。其中原料准备阶段（生料制备）包括原材料破碎粉磨、烘干及预均化过程；煤粉制备阶段包括原煤运输、储存和粉磨；熟料煅烧阶段是预热分解和回转窑中加入煤粉和原料进行加热过程，期间有CO2、SO2、NOx等废气的排放；水泥粉磨阶段包括石膏、石灰石破碎与水泥粉磨。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The main input data of raw materials and energy for each unit are based on the actual production process of the enterprise and the annual production data of 2009-2010, and are converted into the raw materials and energy required for 1 ton of cement based on the cement output. Data related to cement production are obtained from field surveys and calculations.
各单元主要输入原料和能源的数据以该企业实际生产流程和2009-2010两年的全年生产数据为基础，根据水泥产量折算成1t水泥所需要的原料和能量。与水泥生产相关的数据为实地调查、计算得到。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 朴文华, 陈郁, 张树深, & 徐小宁. (2012). 基于LCA方法的水泥企业清洁生产审核. 环境科学学报, 32, 1785–1792.
朴文华, 陈郁, 张树深, & 徐小宁. (2012). 基于LCA方法的水泥企业清洁生产审核. 环境科学学报, 32, 1785–1792.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: A cement company in Dalian has a new dry process kiln cement clinker production line with a daily output of 4,000 tons and an independently mined open-pit limestone mine. There are mineral resources such as limestone and shale distributed around the factory area. There is one cement mill with a diameter of 3.8m and a length of 13m, and two slag mills with a diameter of 3.2m and a length of 13m. The cement production process is mainly divided into four stages: raw meal preparation stage, clinker preparation stage, pulverized coal preparation stage, and cement grinding stage. The main raw materials in the raw meal stage are limestone, shale, silica, and iron powder; the main fuel in the clinker stage is coal; the main raw materials in the cement grinding stage are gypsum, limestone, fly ash, and slag; the main energy sources come from coal and electricity. The enterprise has an annual output of 1.35 million tons of clinker and 700,000 tons of composite Portland cement; the annual production of the rotary kiln is 330 days, and the annual production of the cement mill is 270 days. The products are ordinary Portland grade 42.4 cement and composite Portland grade 32.5 cement.

大连某水泥企业拥有日产4000t新型干法窑水泥熟料生产线和独立开采的露天石灰石矿山，厂区周围分布有石灰石、页岩等矿产资源。现有直径3.8m、长13m水泥磨一台，直径3.2m、长13m矿渣磨两台。水泥生产过程主要分为生料制备阶段熟料制备阶段，煤粉制备阶段、水泥粉磨阶段等4个阶段。生料阶段主要原料有石灰石、页岩、硅石、铁粉；熟料阶段主要燃料是煤炭；水泥粉磨阶段主要原料是石膏、石灰石、粉煤灰、矿渣；其中主要能源来自煤炭和电力。该企业年产熟料135万t年生产复合硅酸盐水泥70万t；回转窑全年生产330d，水泥磨全年生产270d。产品为普通硅酸盐42.4级水泥和复合硅酸盐32.5级水泥。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) of cement products, ensure that the scope of your LCA incorporates the collection of raw materials, coal preparation, clinker calcination, and cement grinding stages. The dataset's functional unit is based on the production of 1 ton of cement. LCA practitioners should take into account the production line's operating days per year and the integration of mixed solid waste materials in the cement composition. Special attention must be given to the emission data during the clinker calcination stage, which includes CO2, SO2, and NOx. Due to regional variances in raw material composition and energy consumption patterns, the geographical and technological applicability should be considered when applying this data to cement manufacturing elsewhere.

当使用这个数据集进行水泥产品的生命周期评价（LCA）时，请确保您的LCA范围涵盖了原料采集、煤粉制备、熟料煅烧和水泥粉磨阶段。数据集的功能单位基于生产1吨水泥。LCA实践者应当考虑到生产线每年的运行天数和混合固体废料在水泥成分中的结合。在熟料煅烧阶段的排放数据，包括CO2、SO2和NOx，必须给予特别关注。由于原材料组成和能源消费模式的地区差异，在将这些数据应用到其他地区的水泥制造时，应当考虑地理和技术的适用性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Electricity. Energy consumption in cement production is mainly from coal and electricity, and the electricity production and coal production in the public system are obtained from the domestically developed CLCD database.
电。水泥生产能源消耗主要分为原煤和电力，其中公用系统中的电力生产、原煤生产部分利用国内开发的CLCD基础数据库获得。

CO2. CO2 emissions come from two parts: coal combustion in clinker production and limestone calcination. Since CO2 emissions are generally not measured, the emissions are calculated based on the CO2 emission formula.
CO2。CO2排放量来自于熟料燃煤和石灰石煅烧两部分，由于CO2排放量一般不做检测，排放量根据CO2排放公式计算得到。
SO2. The emission of SO2 in the exhaust gas is provided by the companies.
SO2。废气中SO2排放量由企业提供。
NOx. The emission of NOx in the exhaust gas is provided by the companies.
NOx。废气中NOx排放量由企业提供。
Dust (emission): exhaust gas, with an unspecified particle size, is treated as PM > 10 micrometers in diameter.
粉尘（排放）：废气，未标明粒径，按PM>10处理。
Chloride: wastewater. In addition, the data on pollutant and wastewater emissions during transportation comes from the lifecycle assessment software GaBi 4.0.
氯化物：废水。此外运输过程中排放的污染物和污水排放数据来自于生命周期评价软件GaBi4.0软件的数据。
Sulfates: wastewater. In addition, the data on pollutant and wastewater emissions during transportation comes from the lifecycle assessment software GaBi 4.0.
硫酸盐：废水。此外运输过程中排放的污染物和污水排放数据来自于生命周期评价软件GaBi4.0软件的数据。

Dust (recovered): solid waste. Solid waste includes dust collected by dust collectors and household garbage. The collected dust is returned to the process, and all household garbage is incinerated in the rotary kiln. In this study, only dust from solid waste is considered, and its data is provided by the company.
粉尘（回收）：固废。固体废弃物包括收尘器收集的粉尘和生活垃圾，其中粉尘统一收集后返回工艺，生活垃圾全部投入回转窑进行焚烧处理，固体废弃物只考虑粉尘，其数据由企业提供。
